page.title: 18Events Flintham/Syerston.
page.content:
Both villages entered the{Best Kept {Village Competition}in 1985. Syerston made the finals in their category of villages under 300 people.
The{Flintham Scout Group}recently celebrated it's 10th anniversary and entertained the Parish Council and scouting dignatories to a buffet lunch in the Old School after church.
After years of ancient{street lighting which failed when it rained, Flintham now has modern lighting designed to be in keeping with a conservation area.
Flintham's{sewers}are archaic and re- sewerage is threatened. Although holes have been dug in preparation nothing else is happening and the holes could become permament features of the street!
